title: AI job angst is everywhere but the corner office
description: Artificial intelligence job losses loom over white-collar sectors. Yet investors are piling into offices and accepting super-low yields of 3% for prime sites, drawn by a shortage of top-quality space. The scarcity appeal of plush buildings can outweigh automation risks.
content: LONDON, Feb 10 (Reuters Breakingviews) - Office property is staging an unfashionable comeback. Investors and occupiers are piling back into prime buildings, pushing rents and values higher, even with the threat of artificial intelligence and its impa... [4013 chars]

title: Amazon MGM Studios turns to AI to cut costs and speed up film and TV production
description: Amazon MGM Studios is rolling out new artificial intelligence tools to streamline filmmaking and television production. Led by veteran executive Albert Cheng, the initiative aims to reduce costs, accelerate workflows, and expand creative possibilities while keeping human creators at the centre of the process.

title: Avnet Insights Survey: APAC Engineers Accelerate AI Adoption Across Industries
description: Bangalore (Karnataka) [India], February 10: Artificial intelligence (AI) is increasingly embedded in products and solutions across Asia-Pacific, as engineers advance adoption while addressing operational and design challenges. This is according to Avnet's fifth annual Avnet Insights survey, which tracks global trends in AI integration across industries. China Masters AI at Scale, Japan Leads in Reliability, Driving Regional Innovation.

title: US Stocks Today | Is Alphabet’s $20 billion bond sale the start of a record AI debt boom?
description: Alphabet, Google's parent, has raised $20 billion through bond sales. This move reflects a broader trend of major technology companies borrowing heavily to fund their expanding artificial intelligence operations. Analysts predict this will drive corporate bond issuance to record levels this year. Companies are investing billions in data centers and processors to support AI growth.

title: US Stock Market | Alphabet looks to raise about $15 billion from US bond sale: Report
description: In a bold financial maneuver, Alphabet is gearing up to raise around $15 billion by launching a US dollar bond sale. This strategic decision is poised to bolster their infrastructure as the demand for artificial intelligence skyrockets. With technology companies increasingly leveraging debt to fuel their AI ventures, Alphabet's bond offering has already garnered an impressive $100 billion in requests.

title: Medical AI can repeat false claims in clinical contexts
description: Medical artificial intelligence (AI) is often described as a way to make patient care safer by helping clinicians manage information. A new study by the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai and collaborators confronts a critical vulnerability: when a medical lie enters the system, can AI pass it on as if it were true?

title: Amazon plans to launch AI content marketplace, The Information reports
description: Feb 9 (Reuters) - Amazon ‌has signaled to publishing industry executives that ‌it is planning to launch a marketplace ‌where publishers can sell their content to firms offering artificial intelligence products, The Information reported on Monday.

title: Amazon plans to launch AI content marketplace: The Information
description: Amazon has signalled plans for a content marketplace where publishers can sell material to firms offering artificial intelligence products, according to The Information. Ahead of an AWS conference, slides mentioned the marketplace alongside core AI tools like Bedrock. This comes as publishers press for usage-based fees in talks with AI companies.

title: Amazon, Google and Microsoft to get tariff relief from Trump admin on chips for data centres, says report - What we know
description: The Trump administration may give big tech players in the US, such as Microsoft, Google and Amazon tariff exemption on chips used for artificial intelligence data centres, FT reported. Here's what we know.
